original_text:
you would plunge me into a slime pit
    so that even my clothes would detest me.
korean_text: 주께서 나를 개천에 빠지게 하시리니 내 옷이라도 나를 싫어하리이다

sentences.original_text: you would plunge me into a slime pit
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나를 진흙 구덩이에 던져 넣을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that even my clothes would detest me
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 나의 옷들조차 나를 혐오하게 될 것입니다
